txt.en: 'Well done, [placeholder]! Our losses were great, but we held out against the foe...it will take them time to recover, and by that time, we should have reinforcements.'

'This battle is over, for the time being.

'I do not expect the Dunlendings will be ready to muster another assault upon Dol Baran until their main force moves out of Wulf's Cleft...and for that, we shall have sufficient warning to gauge their thrust.

'Let us hope that is enough.'
'Here they come, [placeholder]! We must hold this position against the Dunlendings!'
You were unable to defend Grimbold
You have driven back the Dunlendings
Destroyed Dunlending banners ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You defeated the Dunlending chieftain
The Dunlendings are assaulting the Rohirrim encampment atop Dol Baran.
'The day is ours, yes, but at a cost.'
'We must see to the honour of our fallen comrades.'
'Offer them a parley, but I don't...'
Talk to Grimbold
'Wait...what is this unearthly chill!?'
Defend Grimbold
'A servant of the Enemy! Stand fast!'
Destroy Dunlending banners ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You are a carrion beast born of darkness!'
Defeat the Dunlending chieftain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'The Men of Rohan shall not be yours!'
Talk to Grimbold atop Dol Baran
'Think no more of it. This is not a matter for Men.'
Talk to Grimbold atop Dol Baran
'We have our own fallen to see to, and we must be about it.'
See to the dead atop Dol Baran
See to the dead atop Dol Baran
'Put down your weapons, fools.'
'The Dunlendings have fallen back, sir. We have driven them off!'
'Were I here for you, they would avail you not.'
'Aye -- and what of the fallen Dunlendings?'
'But the living are of no import to me. I am here to claim the fallen.'
'Shall we give them leave to come gather their dead?'
'Enough! You may waste your time in meaningless rites of honour...'
'Some dread apparition is upon us! Beware!'
'But Mordor still has use for the dead!'
'The...the Dunlendings...what is he doing?'
'Farewell, Horse-lords -- your time comes soon enough!'
'He has taken the Dunlendings -- yet our own men remain.'
Defend against the Dunlendings atop Dol Baran.
'This bodes ill. The strength of Mordor has grown so great already.'
Grimbold awaits you atop Dol Baran.\n\nYou should speak with Grimbold regarding your victory.
See to the dead atop Dol Baran.
See to the dead atop Dol Baran.
'Stand ready my countrymen! The barbarians approach!'
'See to the right flank!'
'There seems no end to them, but they must tire!'
'Their chieftain has taken to the field! This is it my countrymen, stand fast!'
'Well fought! It is a grim night, but it is ours nonetheless!'

'This battle is over, for the time being.

'I do not expect the Dunlendings will be ready to muster another assault upon Dol Baran until their main force moves out of Wulf's Cleft...and for that, we shall have sufficient warning to gauge their thrust.

'Let us hope that is enough.'
Instance: The Battle of Dol Baran
